name: Bikini Heaven
description:
Bikini Heaven is a relaxing sliding puzzle game that consists of a frame of square tiles in random order.

The object of the puzzle is to place the tiles in order by making sliding moves.

Put pieces together in a logical way in order to arrive at the correct solution for the puzzle in as little time and as few moves as possible.Game Features
  • 3 Game Modes
  • Beautiful Artwork
  • Relaxing background music
  • 23 levels
  • 8 difficulty levels from Beginner to #YOLO
  • 27 steam achievements
